FuncDef: This command, creates a configuration context for the specified MAC filter policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MAC filter policy ID expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 65535.
This keyword is required to create the configuration context. After it is created, the context can be enabled with or without the create keyword.
A string of up to 64 characters uniquely identifying this MAC filter policy.

Configures an optional filter name, up to 64 characters in length, to a given filter. This filter name can then be used in configuration references, display, and show commands throughout the system. A defined filter name can help the service provider or administrator to identify and manage filters within the SR OS platforms. Values-name: 		64 characters maximum.
